metadata.purpose: Help users find practical solutions to problems they may encounter when completing tasks on the VTEX platform.
metadata.usage: A template for documenting known issues and their solutions within the VTEX platform.

title.description: A clear, concise summary of the issue from the user's perspective.
title.voice: First-person perspective to reflect the user's experience
title.format: Avoid questions. Limit to 60 characters. Focus on what the user cannot do.

do: My store is not accepting credit card purchases.
I can’t create a production workspace
dont: Why isn't my credit card payment working?
Error while creating a production workspace

tags.description: List up to 3 relevant product or module names associated with the issue.

dont: Catalog module and Store Framework technology.

keywords.description: Include up to 3 key terms that help surface the article in search results

dont: Catalog module, SKU code, integration with other systems

body.description: Describe the scenario and affected module/functionality in 1–2 concise paragraphs.

do: When attempting to complete a purchase in the checkout module, users encounter the 'Payment not processed' error.
dont: Various issues have been reported by users attempting to place an order.

body.description: Provide a step-by-step guide to resolve the issue, including any necessary prerequisites.

rules.description: For grouped errors, use list format with error messages, meanings, and required actions.
validation_heuristic: The solution is written in a straightforward manner, avoiding jargon and complex terms.

rules.description: Use examples whenever possible to support understanding.
validation_heuristic: The solution presents at least one 'do' example is provided in each section.

rules.description: Use images to illustrate steps in the solution.
validation_heuristic: Images should be clear and relevant to the content.

rules.description: Use links to existing documentation for complex solutions.
validation_heuristic: Links should be relevant and lead to the correct documentation.

rules.description: Use active voice and imperative mood for instructions.
validation_heuristic: Instructions should be clear and actionable.

rules.description: Use numbered steps for step-by-step instructions.
validation_heuristic: Steps should be clear, concise, and easy to follow.

rules.description: Indicate who is responsible for each step (VTEX or user).
Use 'do' and 'don't' examples to clarify common mistakes.
validation_heuristic: Examples should be relevant and help clarify the solution.

rules.description: Use clear, concise language to avoid ambiguity.

do: Make sure the email is correct and the password meets the required format...
dont: Login problems often occur and may be difficult to identify...
